titles.title: A bill for the relief of Doctor Oscar Raul Espinoza Madariaga, his wife Maria Inez, his son, Filipe Andres, and daughter Claudia Paola.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Immigration and Refugee Affairs.

bill.summary: 3/17/1987--Introduced. Declares four named individuals to have been lawfully admitted to the United States for permanent residence under the Immigration and Nationality Act.
